actionable_tasks.title: Implement Circuit Breaker Pattern for Provider Failover
actionable_tasks.description: Add a circuit breaker mechanism to the backend provider selection logic to automatically failover to alternate LLM providers when error rates or latency exceed thresholds. This improves reliability and user experience during provider outages.
implementation_steps: Create a new module (circuitBreaker.js) implementing the circuit breaker logic (open/half-open/closed states, error/latency thresholds).
Integrate the circuit breaker into providerManager.js so that requests are routed to alternate providers when the primary is 'open'.
Update providers.js API endpoints to expose circuit breaker status for monitoring.
Add unit tests for failover scenarios.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Request Correlation IDs for End-to-End Tracing
actionable_tasks.description: Attach unique correlation IDs to each incoming API request and propagate them through backend services for improved observability and debugging.
implementation_steps: Implement middleware to generate and attach a correlation ID to each request (e.g., using UUID).
Ensure the correlation ID is included in logs and passed to downstream services.
Update logging statements to include the correlation ID.
Test with sample requests to verify traceability.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Automated Test Coverage
actionable_tasks.description: Increase the number of automated tests for core backend modules, focusing on recent changes and high-traffic endpoints to improve reliability and catch regressions early.
implementation_steps: Identify endpoints and modules with low test coverage using coverage reports.
Write new unit and integration tests for uncovered logic, especially for provider switching and chat context features.
Run the test suite and verify all tests pass.
Update documentation with new test cases.

actionable_tasks.title: Optimize Dockerfile for Multi-Stage Builds
actionable_tasks.description: Refactor the existing Dockerfile to use multi-stage builds, reducing final image size and improving build caching for faster deployments.
implementation_steps: Update Dockerfile to separate build and runtime stages (e.g., install dependencies, build app, copy to minimal runtime image).
Test the new Docker build locally and verify the image size reduction.
Update docker-compose.yml if necessary to use the optimized image.
Document the changes in the README.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement MongoDB TTL Index for Telemetry Data Rotation
actionable_tasks.description: Add a TTL (Time-To-Live) index to the MongoDB telemetry collection to automatically expire old telemetry documents, reducing storage usage and maintaining performance.
implementation_steps: Update the telemetry schema to include a timestamp field (if not present).
Add code to create a TTL index on the timestamp field (e.g., expire after 30 days).
Test by inserting sample telemetry data and verifying automatic expiration.
Document the TTL policy in the developer docs.
